pages.title: Ecliptic
pages.text: A special biome I call the moonlight lowlands, or glowing fields, harbors a particular crystal block that can be used for lighting your way through the Afterlight dimension. It's easy to get a high amount of this material if you have easy access to the biome.

pages.title: Radiant
pages.text: Another form of crystalized light are radiant crystal blocks. These can only be found in a biome I call the Geode Fields. These can also be easily obtained, and emit a slightly higher amount of light.
